lead_paragraph: Francis Obikwelu of Portugal became the first man since Pietro Mennea of Italy did it in 1978 to complete a sprint double at the European Championships yesterday when he won the 200 meters at Goteborg, Sweden. Obikwelu won the 100 title Tuesday.
snippet: Francis Obikwelu of Portugal became the first man since Pietro Mennea of Italy did it in 1978 to complete a sprint double at the European Championships yesterday when he won the 200 meters at Goteborg, Sweden. Obikwelu won the 100 title Tuesday.
